channel.title: My questions (answer them and win a prize)!
channel.description:
[b]1.[/b]Who is MoparScape? [b]2.[/b]Who is Nashi and what does [u]she[/u] do? [b]3.[/b]Why can't i be a mod? [b]4.[/b]Why can't bootnecklad be a mod? [b]5.[/b]Why can't Squigglyo be a mod? [b]6.[/b]Why can't Kane. be a mod? [b]7.[/b]Why is SCAR pascal based? [b]8.[/b]Why is Kaitnieks the creator of SCAR? [b]9.[/b]Who created Java? [b]10.[/b]Why did they create Java? [b]11.[/b]Who is Bill gates? [b]12.[/b]Why did they name him Bill Gates? [b]13.[/b]Who is Niall? [b]14.[/b]Why is Niall an Admin? [b]15.[/b]Why am i asking these questions? [b]16.[/b]Am i bored? [b]17.[/b]If yes, why / how do you know? [b]18.[/b]What year am i in at school? [b]19.[/b]Why do you go to school? [b]20.[/b]How old am i? [b]21.[/b]Why was i born in 1994? [b]22.[/b]What month was i born in? [b]23.[/b]Why was i born in July? [b]24.[/b]What is MoparScape? [b]25.[/b]Why was it made in Java? [b]26.[/b]What is MoparIsTheBest? [b]27.[/b]Who is RuneScape? [b]28.[/b]Are these real questions? [b]29.[/b]If no, why? If yes, why? [b]30.[/b]WH47 15 1337 5P34K5? [b]31.[/b]WH0 15 1337? [b]32.[/b]Did you answer all of these questions? [b]33.[/b]If yes, why? If yes, did you answer them correctly? [b]34.[/b]Do you want the answers to these questions? [b]35.[/b]If yes, why?
Answer them all [u]correctly[/u] and win a prize. Reply answering [u]ALL[/u] of the questions and not just one.
kthxbai
P.S: Prize is a secret ;)

item.title: My questions (answer them and win a prize)!
item.dc:creator: @k00dr k00dr
item.description:
@k00dr wrote:

CAN I HAS WIN

1.Who is MoparScape?
wdf

2.Who is Nashi and what does she do?
no idea

3.Why can’t i be a mod?
u? r u serious?

4.Why can’t bootnecklad be a mod?
nother mopascaper?

5.Why can’t Squigglyo be a mod?
answered in 4.

6.Why can’t Kane. be a mod?
his gay

7.Why is SCAR pascal based?
cos it sucks

8.Why is Kaitnieks the creator of SCAR?
u mean why is scar the creator of kaitnieks or wut

9.Who created Java?
andrew gover

10.Why did they create Java?
i cant remember, maybe ask andrew

11.Who is Bill gates?
richest guy in the world

12.Why did they name him Bill Gates?
probably cos his the richest guy in the world i duno

13.Who is Niall?
y u askin

14.Why is Niall an Admin?
he probably gud

15.Why am i asking these questions?
is ur homework

16.Am i bored?
well is homework boring well duh

17.If yes, why / how do you know?
like i dont

18.What year am i in at school?
u r probably like 13

19.Why do you go to school?
i need gud grayds

20.How old am i?
u like 13 like i sayd

21.Why was i born in 1994?
if ur 13 u was born in 1995

22.What month was i born in?
hell if i no maby march

23.Why was i born in July?
like i said u wernt

24.What is MoparScape?
u mean who is moparscape? look at 1. question

25.Why was it made in Java?
duno probaby cos is easy

26.What is MoparIsTheBest?
the client

27.Who is RuneScape?
the guy who made mopar

28.Are these real questions?
if theyr not plz tell me

29.If no, why? If yes, why?
u tel me once u find out

30.WH47 15 1337 5P34K5?
what

31.WH0 15 1337?
who 15? though u were 13

32.Did you answer all of these questions?
i tryed

33.If yes, why? If yes, did you answer them correctly?
if i did then i guess but if not then i duno

34.Do you want the answers to these questions?
got them rite here, do u want them?

35.If yes, why?
you mite need them for ur homework

Read full topic

item.title: My questions (answer them and win a prize)!
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

1.What is MoparScape?
nigger-hole
2.Who is Nashi and what does she do?
owns two diggers
3.Why can’t i be a mod?
coz you be black
4.Why can’t bootnecklad be a mod?
impotence, need i say more?
5.Why can’t Squigglyo be a mod?
he doesn’t have two diggers
6.Why can’t Kane. be a mod?
he would whip people
7.Why is SCAR pascal based?
why not?
8.Why is Kaitnieks the creator of SCAR?
the lord jesus created it
9.Who created Java?
not you
10.Why did they create Java?
boredom etc
11.Who is Bill gates?
nerd
12.Why did they name him Bill Gates?
Bill is an acronym for: Bollocks I love Lots
13.Who is Niall?
a deformed puppy
14.Why is Niall an Admin?
because he has puppy dog eyes
15.Why am i asking these questions?
refer to question 3
16.Am i bored?
blacks are never bored they are always stabbing and robbing
17.If yes, why / how do you know?
questions like this are what drives your race towards an untimely end
18.What year am i in at school?
nursery
19.Why do you go to school?
for the lulz
20.How old am i?
as said previously by someone N/A
21.Why was i born in 1994?
thats the year the negro
22.What month was i born in?
have you got a dick growing into your brain?
23.Why was i born in July?
because your mum got hyped up on alcohol in november of the previous year, she then huddled together with a hobo to share body warmth. Loe and behold it seemed to be immaculate conception. Later the hobo admitted to copping a feel and then sticking his dick in
24.What is MoparScape?
refer to question 1
25.Why was it made in Java?
because moparisthebest didnt know any other languages
26.What is MoparIsTheBest?
redneck
27.Who is RuneScape?
bigger nerd than the aforementioned bill gates
28.Are these real questions?
only if you see them
29.If no, why? If yes, why?
i see so yes
30.WH47 15 1337 5P34K5?
niggers use numbers instead of letters
31.WH0 15 1337?
refer to the above
32.Did you answer all of these questions?
work it out dipshit
33.If yes, why? If yes, did you answer them correctly?
for the lulz, and obviously
34.Do you want the answers to these questions?
would i have done it otherwise?
35.If yes, why?
that is my unimpressed face, guess who its looking at? you!
